definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
equivocal speech/to use vague or ambiguous language

sentences.english: A figure loomed up out of the mist.
sentences.chinese: 一个人影在晨雾中隐约出现。

sentences.english: West Lake seemed blurry, and you could only faintly see half of Su Dike.
sentences.chinese: 西湖看起来朦朦胧胧的，苏堤也只能隐约看到一半。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember snarling at someone who stepped on my foot.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得我曾向着那个踩了我一脚的人怒吼。

sentences.english: I kept hearing the sound of applause in the background.
sentences.chinese: 我不断听到隐约的鼓掌声。

sentences.english: Over the high banks, the cottage roofs and the tops of the bamboo clumps are visible.
sentences.chinese: 高高的河岸上，竹林梢头农舍的屋顶隐约可见。

sentences.english: Neon lights gleamed in the deepening mists.
sentences.chinese: 霓虹灯在渐浓的雾霭中隐约闪烁。

sentences.english: Some parleying was audible in the hall, and soon the new-comer entered.
sentences.chinese: 大厅里隐隐约约响起了交谈声，来人很快便进了屋。

sentences.english: I feel that he is kind of grouchy today.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约感到他今天不太对劲。

sentences.english: The copy is blurred, it is not very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这个复制件被弄隐约了，不太清楚。

sentences.english: On Exmoor, hedge banks faintly trace the far hill.
sentences.chinese: 在埃克斯穆尔高地，远处山坡上隐约可见长长的篱墙。

sentences.english: One can faintly discern the flavour of lemon.
sentences.chinese: 可以隐约觉得有一点柠檬味。

sentences.english: The voice drifted faintly up from below.
sentences.chinese: 声音隐约的从楼下传上来。

sentences.english: Good humour gleamed in his eyes and lurked in the corners of his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 一种幽默感在他的眼中隐约地闪现，也潜伏在嘴角上。

sentences.english: Beautiful melody infected me, as if vaguely heard the heart-breaking voice.
sentences.chinese: 优美的旋律感染着我，好像隐约听到心碎的声音。

sentences.english: The Island of Monte Cristo loomed large in the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 基督山岛隐约地耸现在地平线上了。

sentences.english: I can just make out the horse in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我只能隐约看见远处的那匹马。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
